style.textcontent: body { font-family: 'Segoe UI', Tahoma, Geneva, Verdana, sans-serif; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #000000 0%, #0a0a0a 100%); margin: 0; padding: 2px !important; color: #ffffff; } .section { max-width: 1200px; margin: 0 auto; background: #0a0f1e !important; border-radius: 5px; box-shadow: 0 10px 40px rgba(0,0,0,0.9); padding: 30px; border: 1px solid #1f4068; color: #ffffff !important; } .section * { color: #ffffff; } .section h2 { color: #00d9ff !important; } .section h3 { color: #ff3366 !important; } .section .demo-title { color: #ff3366 !important; } .demo-box { background: #050510; border-left: 4px solid #ff3366; margin: 25px 0; border-radius: 3px; padding: 20px; box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(255,51,102,0.3); } .demo-title { font-size: 1.3em; font-weight: bold; color: #ff3366; margin-bottom: 15px; text-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(255,51,102,0.5); } .code-block { background: #000000; color: #ffffff; border-radius: 3px; font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; overflow-x: auto; margin: 15px 0; white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: 0.95em; min-height: 60px; line-height: 1.4; padding: 15px; border: 1px solid #00d9ff; } h2 { color: #00d9ff; font-size: 2.5em; margin-bottom: 20px; text-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(0,217,255,0.6); } h3 { color: #00d9ff; font-size: 1.8em; margin-top: 30px; margin-bottom: 15px; } p { color: #ffffff; line-height: 1.6; } ul li { color: #ffffff; } label { color: #ffffff; } strong { color: #ffffff; } table { width: 100%; border-collapse: collapse; margin: 15px 0; } th { background: #000000; color: #00d9ff; border: 1px solid #00d9ff; padding: 10px; } td { color: #ffffff; border: 1px solid #00d9ff; padding: 10px; } input, textarea { background: #000000; color: #ffffff; border: 2px solid #00d9ff; border-radius: 3px; padding: 8px; } button { background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff3366 0%, #cc0033 100%); color: #ffffff; border: none; padding: 10px 20px; border-radius: 3px; cursor: pointer; font-weight: 600; transition: all 0.3s ease; box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(255,51,102,0.4); } button:hover { background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff5588 0%, #ff3366 100%); transform: translateY(-2px); box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(255,51,102,0.6); } a { color: #00d9ff; text-decoration: none; } a:hover { color: #66e6ff; text-decoration: underline; } div[style*='background'] { background: #000000 !important; border: 2px solid #00d9ff; color: #ffffff; }
style.ignored: body { font-family: 'Segoe UI', Tahoma, Geneva, Verdana, sans-serif; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%); margin: 0;  padding: 2px !important; } .section { max-width: 1200px; margin: 0 auto; background: white; border-radius: 15px; box-shadow: 0 10px 40px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);  padding: 2px !important; .demo-box { background: #f8f9fa; border-left: 4px solid #667eea; margin: 25px 0; border-radius: 8px;  padding: 2px !important; .demo-title { font-size: 1.3em; font-weight: bold; color: #667eea; margin-bottom: 15px; } .code-block { background: #2d2d2d; color: #f8f8f2; border-radius: 8px; font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; overflow-x: auto; margin: 15px 0; white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: 0.95em; min-height: 60px; line-height: 1.4;  padding: 2px !important; h2 { color: #667eea; font-size: 2.5em; margin-bottom: 20px; } h3 { color: #764ba2; font-size: 1.8em; margin-top: 30px; margin-bottom: 15px; }

p.textcontent: The <tabs> element creates tabbed navigation interfaces that can load content from JSON files dynamically.
Each tab definition has three parts separated by colons:

li.textcontent: Tab Label - The text shown on the tab button
Tab ID - Unique identifier for the tab content area
Source File - Path to JSON file to load

p.textcontent: Click the tabs below to see dynamic content loading:
Tabs can load complex JSON structures with forms, buttons, and interactive elements:
Tabs automatically get classes you can style:
You can modify the tab attribute dynamically:

li.textcontent: ‚úÖ Use unique IDs for each tab content area
‚úÖ Keep tab labels short and descriptive
‚úÖ Use emojis in labels for visual appeal
‚úÖ Organize related content in the same tab group
‚úÖ Provide loading indicators for slow-loading content
‚úÖ Test tab navigation on mobile devices
‚úÖ Use consistent JSON structure across tab sources

td.textcontent: Text displayed on the tab button
Unique identifier for the tab's content area
Path to JSON file containing tab content
Use semicolon (;) between tabs, colon (:) between parts
